item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 28, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Cat memes went viral 100 years ago (29 points | 1 comment)
3. The perils of transition to 64-bit time_t (173 points | 120 comments)

6. Four more health care workers ill after caring for bird flu case in Missouri (35 points | discuss)

8. Show HN: Mitata – Benchmarking tooling for JavaScript (54 points | 18 comments)

10. SpaceX launches rescue mission for 2 NASA astronauts who are stuck on the ISS (20 points | 14 comments)
11. SunVox: Powerful Modular Synthesizer and DAW (138 points | 38 comments)

14. Surprising sounds could cause riskier decision-making (6 points | discuss)

24. Icon (real creators, AI ads) is hiring founding engineers/ex-founders (NYC) ( | hide)

26. Researchers seeing little evidence of benefit from co pilots (19 points | 3 comments)

29. What was the point of [ "x$var" = "xval" ]? (2021) (56 points | 32 comments)
